document_data.name: Thamor
document_data.mainbody: '''Thamor''' was an independent trading city found in central [[Threskel]].
document_data.Government: While Thamor was officially ruled by a [[human]] lord, leadership was controlled at least in part by Threskel's capital city of [[Mourktar]]. Like other cities in Threskel, Thamor's lord served the [[chromatic dragon]]s loyal to the [[Great Bone Wyrm]] that reigned over the entire realm.
document_data.Trade: As of the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]], most of the city's traders exchanged goods with farmers from the badlands along the southern stretch of Threskel, as well as the miners that made their living in the [[Riders to the Sky]] mountain range.
document_data.History:
The city was founded as a place where traders from [[Unther]] and [[Mulhorand]] could freely exchange goods without having to pay any taxes.

After the collapse of [[Unther]] following [[Gilgeam]]'s death during the [[Avatar Crisis]] of the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, Thamor struggled for some time before experiencing a strong recovery.
